programme.title: Batman Vs Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Batman, Batgirl and Robin forge an alliance with The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles to fight against the Turtles' sworn enemy, The Shredder, who has teamed up with Ra's Al Ghul and The League Of Assassins.

programme.title: Reminiscence
programme.desc: Nick Bannister, a private investigator of the mind, navigates the alluring world of the past when his life is changed by new client Mae. A simple case becomes an obsession after she disappears and he fights to learn the truth about her.

programme.title: Arts 21

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S21
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S1
programme.desc: A visit to the northern part of Western Australia finds Curtis in the quintessential Outback where he is educated by an Aboriginal elder on ancient fishing methods, herds cattle with a fifth-generation female rancher, and uncovers pearls in an oyster shell.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Continuing in Sapa, Luke ventures beyond the main town and visits the local villages where he delves into some rich local traditions. Luke prepares a dish in the clouds with local Su May in her village, Ta Phin. Here, they cook field mushrooms gathered in the early morning. He cooks a pork-skewer dish in front of a beautiful waterfall in the heart of Cat Cat village, and learns how the local Mong people eat, sharing a communal salmon hot pot that he prepares on the porch of a local home.

programme.title: Sing To The Dawn
programme.desc: Dana is a little gril who lives in a small village in Batam with her little sister, Rai, father Somad and grandmother, commonly called "Oma". Pairot is an entrepreneur and cruel landlord who assessed the villagers with an oppressive land tax. Claiming that the entire land of the village is his as he has a document from King Ramelan, the former ruler of the village. The village is unaware that Pairot is planning to evict them and destroy the village to build a city with hotels and casinos.

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S1
programme.desc: Loco is going out on night service for the very first time. Loco is terrified even before going out, and Mr. Herb encourages him as much as he can. However, because of a sudden change in weather and a power failure, it becomes one of Loco's scariest moments in his life. Loco comes back to Train Village in tears and vows never to go out on night service again.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: When the town is attacked by a giant fluffy monster, Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy have to work quickly to stop it. However, they learn that the monster may not be what it seems. Sloppy attempts to create a new app that'll make his friends take a break from their phones, but a malfunction causes a virtual virus to spread instead, zombifying everyone in Ollipolis.

programme.title: 棘手问题
programme.desc: (重) 一些科学家指出，如果我们继续以这样的速度产生温室气体，我们将可以看到更多的害虫。地球暖化不仅会导致害虫数量增加，也会让它们的食欲大增。事实上，如淡滨尼和樟宜那么大的一群蝗虫，就可以在一天内，摧毁足够养活新加坡10倍人口的粮食。就目前来说，全球有10%到15%的农作物遭害虫所破坏，而气温每上升一个摄氏度，全球的粮食产量就会下降10%到25%。尽管我们的粮食供应受到地球暖化的威胁，我们目前的饮食习惯却也是导致地球暖化的原因之一。从饲养牲畜、种植蔬菜，到加工及运输……只要你进食，你就属于占全球温室气体排.

programme.desc: (重)《香港原味道》新四辑，谭玉瑛第四次领军，带着黄庭锋、孔德贤、林正峰继续追味寻源，从香港农田、鱼排，见证当地农业、渔业的发展。深入土炮食材的产地，寻找真正来自当地或香港制造的优质食材。每集深入认识一种地道食材，走进当地鱼场、鲜果园、鲜菜园、水耕菜工场、食品厂、酱油厂等等，发掘更多当地饮食智慧，品尝每一口新鲜美味，探索每一种港产食材背后的故事。.

programme.title: 热血合唱团
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重) 国际知名合唱团指挥家严梓朗（刘德华饰），为帮助昔日恩师（卢冠廷饰）返回香港，带领一群因闯祸而被迫参加“热血合唱团试验计划”的“废柴”学生们，从零起步学习合唱。众人一起面对生活的挫折与挑战，最终在音乐中找回了自我，用歌声治愈人生的同时，严梓朗深藏在心底的秘密也逐步被揭开.

programme.title: 看不见的设计

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: 自70年代起，越南开始出现许多畸形婴儿，以及生来就患有重病的儿童。这些疾病似乎都来自同一个根源—“橙剂”。这是一种高效除草剂，在越战时，被美国军方大量喷洒在越南各地。如今，战争结束已将近50年，不过，这个毒性极强的化学品仍在影响着越南第三代、甚至第四代的孩童.

Amidst all these twists. Season 2 is sure to bring a good family entertainer.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi 2023
programme.desc: Tamil Seithi 2023.

programme.title: Oh Butterfly!
programme.desc: An amazing opportunity arises at Prabu's workplace to visit an overseas museum for research. Landing in Switzerland, he tours the museum, feeling an intense, inexplicable connection to it. As he struggles to unravel his emotions, he encounters a woman standing precariously on a bridge. After spending an unforgettable day together with her, Prabu finally uncovers the missing piece that fills the void in his life.

programme.title: Ethir Neechal
programme.desc: Ethir Neechal (Against The Tide) is a 13-part documentary-drama series showcasingremarkable stories of individuals who have faced and conquered traumatic experiencesand paved their own ways for their second lease of life. Through the incredible storiesof these survivors, the series seeks to shed light on the resilience of the human spirit.Ethir Neechal is a tribute to those who have overcome seemingly insurmountable oddsand serves as a reminder that we are all capable of extraordinary.

programme.title: Vilangu
programme.desc: Vilangu (Handcuff/ Beast) is an inspirational and emotional social drama that entails the journeys of three ex-convicts: Thiyaagaraajan, Sivaprakash and Johnny @ Janaardhan. Three different men, three different age groups, three different backgrounds, three different social strata and three different crimes. But their paths cross and their lives are intertwined by one common factor: All 3 are former criminals who have been cuffed' for life by society.

programme.desc: Mr Ramany is a low-wage sales salesman who is constantly chastised by his wife, Mrs. Ramany. Mr Ramany is innocent.
